arts.ttl: Neil Critchley slams ref as Hearts boss says penalty award torpedoed game plan in Copenhagen
arts.sum: Kevin Diks slammed home from the spot with 12 minutes remaining to end any hopes of the Jambos nicking a point.

arts.ttl: Heartsâ€™ Conference League hopes suffer blow after Copenhagen defeat
arts.sum: Hearts have now lost three consecutive games in the competition.

arts.ttl: Hearts find out Carlsberg catchphrase doesn't apply to them as Copenhagen dish out a Conference League headache
arts.sum: The Jambos are now drinking in last chance saloon with the visit of Moldovans Petrocub

arts.ttl: Blair Spittal keen to 'get one over' Celtic sparring partner as Hearts star looks to stun Copenhagen
arts.sum: The Jambos ace is level with Mohamed Elyounoussi in their head-to-heads and is desperate to to come out on top against the wide man

arts.ttl: Lawrence Shankland Hearts penalty teaser as boss Neil Critchley has his say on who will step up in Copenhagen
arts.sum: Hearts skipper suffered a bruising night in Brugge but would he step forward if the Jambos get a spot kick tomorrow night?

arts.ttl: Craig Halkett targets third time lucky for Hearts against 'European giant' as defender looks to shake curse
arts.sum: The big defender's Euro journey has been a tale of injury woe over the past three seasons but there's no better time for that to change
